column6:
This room is Texas style! It is huge, larger than the size of most studio apartments in big cities! 
There is a Queen size bed as well as a Queen size sleeper couch with a built in desk or vanity nook that leads into a private bathroom. 
Standard room rate is for two people. 
Please no smoking in the house. (You may smoke outside if cigarette butts are disposed in a sealed container.)
Please no illegal activity on the premises.
Please no eating in the room, use the dining room or kitchen.
column9: Studio apartment sized room with private bathroom
